summary: referee mark clattenburg has been named to take charge of the manchester derby on sunday . city captain vincent kompany was dismissed for two bookable offences during belgium 's narrow euro 2016 qualifier on march 31 . clattenburg has been accused of favouring louis van gaal 's side in the past .

explain: Mark Clattenburg will be refereeing the Manchester derby this season, as he has already sent off three players throughout his assignments thus far.
Clattenburg, though controversial because of past allegations of favouritism towards certain teams, is considered to be the Premier League's top referee due to his expertise and experience.
